title: Interpretivist research process
desc: PhD research flow diagram (interpretivist paradigm)

title: Context engineering over multimodal RAG
desc: Carbon-styled flow: strategy → components → assembly → analyzer → fusion → generation.

title: Integrated research mapping
desc: Venn of archival analysis, practice-based intervention, and computational modelling

title: Research brainstorm
desc: Context → Research question, Interpretivism and critical theory → Research question, and Taxonomic classification

title: API flow
desc: Flow of Cooper Hewitt GraphQL API requests through Vite, Cloudflare, and S3/Postgres.

title: DDR Taxonomy
desc: Faceted taxonomy of the RCA Department of Design Research archive, structured by core intended, residual/critical and extended categories

title: Admin Usecase
desc: Shows the administrator workflow: logging in, ingesting metadata, uploading media, managing terms, and reviewing audit logs.

title: Apiflow
desc: Depicts backend communication flow: React UI → FastAPI backend → DigitalOcean Spaces/Postgres → provenance logging.

title: Backend Components
desc: Breakdown of backend services: authentication, request handling, ingestion, taxonomy, audit logging, storage, and database.

title: Container Diagram
desc: Container-level view of frontend, backend, storage, and database with secure authentication and communication links.

title: ERD Datamodel
desc: Entity–relationship diagram showing how artefact metadata, media, users, and audit logs are structured in PostgreSQL.

title: Ingestion Sequence Diagram
desc: Sequence diagram of metadata ingestion: form validation, secure media upload, and confirmation from backend services.

title: React
desc: React logo placeholder — for UI experiments and integration with Carbon Design System.

title: Search Query Sequence Flow
desc: End-to-end flow of a search query: researcher → frontend UI → FastAPI backend → PostgreSQL vector search → results.

title: Search UI Components
desc: Frontend components for search: query input, filters, semantic results list, and related artefacts display.

title: Security Auth Flow
desc: Authentication and authorization sequence: admin login via identity provider, token validation, and API access.

title: Semantic Search Architecture
desc: System architecture for semantic search: embeddings, pgvector storage, FastAPI GraphQL endpoint, and result ranking.

title: System Context Diagram
desc: High-level system context: administrators, researchers, backend services, storage, and databases with secure flows.

title: IDE x DDR timeline
desc: Timeline of the transition from ID(E)RU to DDR, 1962–1986.

title: DDR activities
desc: Faceted overview of DDR activities across members, projects, and periods.

title: Risk management log
desc: Identifies, scores, and monitors key academic, practice, ethics, and well-being risks with clear mitigation strategies, actions, and stakeholders to support your PhD project
